name: Vintervarg
description:
Vintervarg (2013) is a short atmospheric sci-fi third-person adventure puzzle set in an aged underground facility built to preserve humankind allegedly. Uncover your surroundings and unravel the mystery about your circumstances.

The game has voice acting.

This undertaking was a project from 2013 utilizing UDK (Unreal Development Kit).  I thought I upload it here, instead of letting this project collect dust.

 
Press W,A,S,D to move
Press shift to Sprint
Press E or Left click to use item
Mousewheel to Zoom out
Hold Right Click to Zoom
